channel.title: Art on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Art on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Turn Your Old Tech Into Art—Now With a 20% Discount
item.description: Grid Studio is celebrating its 5th anniversary with a 20 percent off sitewide sale. Its art pieces include deconstructed iPhones, Game Boys, and even the original Samsung Galaxy S.

item.title: Turn Your Old Tech Into Art—Now With a 20% Discount
item.description: Grid Studio is celebrating its 5th anniversary with a 20 percent off sitewide sale. Its art pieces include deconstructed iPhones, Game Boys, and even the original Samsung Galaxy S.

item.title: I Went to an AI Film Festival Screening and Left With More Questions Than Answers
item.description: Runway AI paired up with Imax to screen 10 AI-generated winning selections. The festival has been derided by some cinephiles, while others insist it’s part of a natural technological evolution.

item.title: I Went to an AI Film Festival Screening and Left With More Questions Than Answers

item.title: The Kryptos Key Is Going Up for Sale
item.description: Jim Sanborn is auctioning off the elusive solution to K4, the outdoor sculpture that sits at CIA headquarters.

item.title: The Kryptos Key Is Going Up for Sale

item.title: Anime Girl VTubers Are Selling Out Concerts, but Are They ‘Real?’ Depends on Who You Ask
item.description: Virtual anime streamers are selling out live venues, singing at pro sports games, and launching record labels, with fans showering them with presents and suspending disbelief in service of the bit.

item.title: These LGBTQ+ Archives Defy Erasure, One Memory at a Time
item.description: In Latin America, LGBTQ+ history collections are a form of resistance. Grassroots projects are using the memories of community members to fight against systematic violence and demand justice.
